name: Ravenous
description:
Ravenous is a game where you take control of Viola, a musician who has suffered a terrible fate from the corrupt. She has awoken with only her ravenous hatred fueling her goals in the afterlife. Revenge.  With your violin in hand, you emit powerful soundwaves which lay waste to the minds of those that had previously wronged you. 

WASD to move. Keep the enemies in the circle to deal damage over time while also avoiding their attacks.

Music: Through the White Steppes (Recreated) by Alexander Nakarada (www.serpentsoundstudios.com)
